text: The Vassal Assembly is a [[liturgical council]] which oversees a large portion of the Brey Crossing duchy of [[Breland]] ([[Starilaskur]] and the surrounding area). Along with the [[Brelish|Breland]] government, they chartered the [[Martial Temple of Dol Arrah]] in [[751 YK|Khorvaire calendar]].
title: Vassal Assembly
tooltip: Sovereign Host liturgical council for Starilaskur and surrounding area
